mapper.select: select member_id, profile_picpath, profile_content, list_address, profile_picpath from sitter_profile
mapper.insert: insert into sitter_profile (member_id, profile_picpath, profile_content, price_small, price_medium, price_large, profile_roadaddress, profile_jibunaddress, profile_detailaddress, list_address) values(#{member_ID}, #{profile_PicPath}, #{profile_Content}, #{price_Small}, #{price_Medium}, #{price_Large}, #{profile_RoadAddress}, #{profile_JibunAddress}, #{profile_DetailAddress}, #{list_Address})

insert into license (member_id, license_id, license_picpath, license_name, license_agency, license_date) values(#{member_ID}, seq_license.nextval, #{license_PicPath}, #{license_Name}, #{license_Agency}, #{license_Date})

insert into service (member_id, service_00, service_01, service_02, service_03, service_04, service_05, service_06, service_07) values(#{member_ID}, #{petService[0]}, #{petService[1]}, #{petService[2]}, #{petService[3]}, #{petService[4]}, #{petService[5]}, #{petService[6]}, #{petService[7]})
insert into schedule (member_id, schedule_id, schedule_closed) values(#{member_ID}, seq_schedule.nextval, #{schedule_Closed})
